name: Srheck out of control
description:
Help srehctk reach the top in this fantastic platformer of next generation!!

(ps5 release incoming)

CONTROLS:

you can play with keyboard or xbox controller:

MOVE -  asdw  or  joyscticks

JUMP -  space or A

RUN  -  LShift or RB

( Remember you can do wall jumps!!!!1!!! )
